message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $750000. It's a great price, considering its value and uniqueness. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $650000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
